description: Try our easy to follow Bean & Mushroom Fettuccine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bean & Mushroom Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add leek and mushroom and cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until leek is tender and mushroom is golden. Stir in cream and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 3 minutes or until thickened slightly. Stir in beans and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Toss through pasta with chives. Season. Serve.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Add leek and mushroom and cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until leek is tender and mushroom is golden. Stir in cream and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 3 minutes or until thickened slightly. Stir in beans and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Toss through pasta with chives. Season. Serve.
